snippet: Officials said the investigator, who has resigned, will not be allowed to work in the New York City school system again. A report also recommended that the teacher be fired.
abstract: Lawrence Scott, New York City Education Department detective who was checking into accusations of misconduct by teacher Natalya Sokolson Gordon in Coney Island, Brooklyn, instead engaged in a sexually explicit phone relationship with her; Scott resigned and it has been recommended that Gordon be fired.
lead_paragraph: Officials said the investigator, who has resigned, will not be allowed to work in the New York City school system again. A report also recommended that the teacher be fired.

headline.main: Schools Official Investigating Teacher Exchanged Explicit Texts With Her, Report Finds
headline.print_headline: Official Found to Have Texted With Teacher He Investigated
